title: New: ceo – Ave Maria (Blondie Cover)
body:
When this tune dropped yesterday, my first thought was ‘has **Maria Sharapova** died?’.

The very concept of **[Ceo](http://www.facebook.com/pages/ceo/116607215028168)** releasing a jam indebted to the famous tennis player just for the sake of it was, at least at the time, a baffling possibility. But no, the record stands tall as an expression of love, or at the very least admiration toward the tennis star. The track is rather loosely a cover of **Blondie**’s **_Maria_**, but frankly the word ‘cover’ perhaps demeans the aim of the track. The sounds that we associate with **Ceo** are ever present, the folk sounds stretching through time zones in the most interesting of ways, it’s clear that **Ceo** was never intimidated by the sing he was recreating. Check out the tune below and watch the accompanying video while you’re at it.

[ceo Ave Maria](http://soundcloud.com/modularpeople/ceo-ave-maria) by [modularpeople](http://soundcloud.com/modularpeople)
